pullRequest.title: feat: Enrollment/Events note persistence
pullRequest.bodyText:
Persist notes for events and enrollment for "new" tracker
Simplified notes validation logic to be in sync with current tracker importer
Add UID generation for notes
refactor: removed commentService as a dependency for all the validation hooks
add unit and integration tests

ref: DHIS2-9083
NOTE: This PR was actually ready last week, but due to some conflicts I had to recreate the branch and the PR. There were some minor stylistic comments from Morten and Lars, which have been addressed.

commit.message:
feat: Enrollment/Events note persistence

- Persist notes for events and enrollment for "new" tracker
- Simpliefied notes validation logic to be in sync with current tracker importer
- Add UID generation for notes
- refactor: removed `commentService` as dependency for all the validation hooks
- add unit and integration tests

ref: DHIS2-9083

nodes.bodyText: Minor performance issue, if you do setAutoFields and uid is not set, it will generate one for you.. so maybe better to set the uid first

commit.message: fix: assign UID before call to setAutoFields
